name: Super Dinosaurs !
description:
⚠️ If the game don't start from here, go to http://uniserv.unikaz.fr:8080/index.html ⚠️
⚠️ Si le jeu ne démarre pas, allez sur http://uniserv.unikaz.fr:8080/index.html ⚠️

    In Super Dinosaurs, you start as an Egg. When you meet another egg, you'll fight at Shifumi (Rock Paper Scissors) with a chance to evolve as a Chicken ! In the same way, Chicken evolves to Dinosaur and Dinosaurs become Super Dinosaurs ! During a Shifumi, if you play the same move as your opponent, you both regress to your last evolve !


    But be aware that a more evolved player than you can eat you without warning or shifumi ! Eat small opponents to earn points !

    If you evolve to Super Dinosaur, you can fight with other Super Dinosaurs, and if you win, the other one will become one of your supporters, and you'll win a portion of what he or she earns.
